column4: I am using totem and I think its using gstreamer. I want to play a dvd but it has no sound. I have heard xine is better supported in general and that the sound would work better. How do I remove totem gstreamer and get the xine one properly/
You can change to the Xine Backend for Xine by doing: totem-backend -b xine
Xine backend for Totem I meant
you need to execute the command as root (add sudo in front)
i did install it though and its still not found.
I guess it's part of the totem-xine package
I installed totem-xine, there is no backend
